Interface ServerInterface

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    RMIServer

    public interface ServerInterface
extends java.rmi.Remote
    ServerInterface class that includes all the RMIServer remote methods

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String authentication(int clientNo, boolean isLogin, java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password)
      Remote login and register method
      int getClientNoFromPrimary()
      Remote method used by the Client to get its assigned clientNo by RMIServer
      java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,ClientInterface> getHashMapFromPrimary()
      Remote method used by BackupRMIServer to get the map between clientNo and ClientInterface stored in the PrimaryRMIServer
      java.lang.String grantPrivileges(int clientNo, java.lang.String username)
      Remote method used by an admin to grant privileges to another admin
      java.lang.String indexNewURL(int clientNo, java.lang.String url)
      Remote method to index a new URL by the admin
      java.lang.String linksPointing(int clientNo, java.lang.String url)
      Remote method the links pointing to another link
      java.lang.String logout(int clientNo, java.lang.String username, boolean exit)
      Remote method to logout an user
      java.lang.String realTimeStatistics(int clientNo)
      Remote method called by an admin to get the realTimeStatistics

      Remote Hello RMI method from BackupRMIServer to PrimaryRMIServer

      Remote Hello RMI method from Client to PrimaryRMIServer

      Remote search method
